overview: Why do Skinny Boys always seem to have the biggest cocks? Blond cover models Julian and Boris get down and dirty with dicks almost as big as their arms. Join Julian and Boris, along with Jason Mannato, Adrian Rogers, Lou Devane, Jonathan Linz, Jerry Harris, Jon Elvin, Dennis Wesley and Marty Foster as these Skinny Boys hang on for the rides of their lives.
title: Skinny Boys
